text: Hontōni, gense no seikatsu o tatoereba, ten kara ware ga furaseru mizu (ame) no yōna monodearu. Sorede ue o uruoshi, ningen ya kachiku no tabemono o shigera seru. Daichi ga bireina yosōi de ōwa rete kazara reru to, soko no (jū) min wa, sono zenken o motta to omoikomu. Daga waga meirei ga, yoru mo hiru mo ichido kudareba, kinō wa 緊茂 Shite ita hazu no mono ga kariki tora reta kabu no yō ni kawarihateru. Ware wa kono yō ni, jukuryo suru hitobito no tame ni (ware no) shirushi o kaimei suru.
